title: Databases and SQL for Data Science
description: Database for data science hands on labs

title: Applied Data Science Capstone
description: A project-based capstone course that applies data science skills to solve real-world problems using data analysis, visualization, and predictive modeling.

title: Generative AI and LLMs Architecture and Data preparation
description: A comprehensive course covering the architecture of generative AI and large language models, with a focus on data collection, cleaning, and preparation for effective model training.

title: Machine Learning with Python (with Honors)
description: A practical course focused on building, training, and deploying machine learning models using Python and popular libraries like NumPy, pandas, and scikit-learn.

title: Machine Learning
description:
Supervised learning (linear regression, logistic
regression, neural networks, decision trees), unsupervised learning
(clustering, anomaly detection), recommender systems, and
reinforcement learning.

title: IBM Data Science
description: End-to-end data science pipeline, encompassing Python programming, SQL data extraction, exploratory analysis, and the deployment of machine learning models to drive data-driven decision-making.
